mainText:
The Schuth household wishes to extend our saddest condolences to the Jobs
family. We hope the outpouring of love and respect from around the world
helps you through. Our prayers are with Steve, and with you.

Sincerely,


Joanna and William Schuth

-- 
"I calculated the odds of this succeeding versus the odds I was doing
something incredibly stupid...and I went ahead anyway."
author: Joanna
